entry.title: FLASH FREEZE WARNING , Salaberry-de-Valleyfield
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:45 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Saint-Anicet 10:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: 2.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: 2.1°C
Wind: NE 40 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Rain or snow. High 7 with temperature falling to minus 1 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow this afternoon. Rainfall amount 15 to 25 mm. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 50 gusting to 80 this afternoon. High 7 with temperature falling to minus 1 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 13 this afternoon. Forecast issued 08:51 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 08:51 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 30 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 08:51 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
